title: AA Big Book Study And Speakers
creator: Anthony Nutter

extendedInfo.description: Seamlessly stream Joe & Charlie, Big Book and Old Time Speaker audio files on the go.  Joe & Charlie discuss the Big Book Chapter by Chapter.  The 12 steps are elaborated on by Joe & Charlie to assist the never ending step work.  The Big Book is also played as an audio book chapter by chapter, page by page.Old Time Speakers include : Bill W., Mary R., Chuck C., Mildred F....  This app aids individuals studying on their own.  Group discussion and topics may be guided by these tapes, providing the meeting chair with endless points of interest.Audio files are public domain.

reviews.title: Mary
reviews.comment: Works great and love you can listen to it on your cellphone, take it everywhere with you!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rip-off
reviews.comment: Why sell something that doesn\'t work. a few of the speakers play. none of the Joe Charlie load. Couldn\'t play any of the big book study. Thanks for working an on this program. What a ripoff
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: I am not the best at picking up my BB and reading as often as I should. Now I listen in the car and at at work, Love it! Would give it 5 stars but a couple of the speakers didn\'t load and play. Thank you
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: selfish
reviews.comment: this app is supposed to help people who can\'t read or write  rip off.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: great
reviews.comment: works perfect, has all i need
reviews.author: A Google User
